title: "He kaupapa whakangungu e pai ake ai te āpōpō o te rangatahi me te whānau"
excerpt: "Kua whakakotahi Te Rūnanga o Waihōpai me Southern Group Training Trust kia tokona te whaiwāhi atu a te rangatahi ki ngā ahumahi, waihoki kia whāia ai ngā rawa katoa kia tutuki ngā tohu."
